comment: Balkema is an amazing professor and person. She's super easy to get along with and her jokes during class are hilarious. The course itself is a complete joke, glad KSU is getting rid of it but it was an easy A if you do the work.
Coach is great! She is kind and funny and understanding! Super easy class, a few tough quizzes, but if you do the other homework its an easy A :)

I loved this class! It was easy and fun. Mrs. Balkema is super funny and charismatic! Also don't worry if you're not that great at physical activity, as you'll barely do any of it depending on what your smart goal will be. This class makes you buy a bearface online code and you do all of your quizzes and such at home. It's a great class to take!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: HIGHLY RECOMMEND. She is hilarious and naked health easy and enjoyable. Do your work on time and its and extremely easy A. Go to her class because she is hilarious and you will genuinely enjoy going.

Abby Balkema is super sweet and she really just wants everyone to succeed in this class. She doesn't expect everyone to treat this class like it's the most important thing ever. She honestly just wants her class to be a nice break from other classes that are actually hard. Highly highly recommend. Awesome teacher and a great person overall!

It's a basic Wellness class and she wants the class to be as easy as possible for us. Lots of modules which you can either do at home or in class. She has a great attitude and you can tell she tries to make us laugh

such an easy class. honestly she has a sign in sheet but you can have someone sign u in and everything is online. there are 6 modules and they take about 5 minutes to finish. shes pretty funny but class still isn't worth going to because its a joke. u gotta buy a bearface code from the bookstore but bearface has a website where u can get it cheaper
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Ahhh I love her, made my first semester of college way more enjoyable. Hw on bareface are pretty easy but a lot, just do them on time and you wont fall behind. Makes journal type entries about your SMART goal which you would fill out and submit by due date. Shes very understanding just ask and she do what she can. Gives extra credit too!

literally amazing. hilarious and easy. no real excercise and its mainly just busy work online. You must buy the program bearface that is $60 but thats for every Wellness class. and the Tests are jokes.

If you do not like online classes, I suggest Abbys class. I learned a lot in her class surprisingly because it was university requirement. She breaks it down and she doesnt make you feel as if its just repeated information. She does well with taking her own advice and SHE IS HILARIOUS!! absolutely wonderful.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: Super fun! SUPER easy! most assignments are online Bareface. Not your average wellness, didn't do a lot of physical activities.

This class was super easy. Attendance is mandatory but if you find a friend that can sign you in, you will be fine if you need to skip. I loved her. She was super funny and nice. The lectures are pretty boring but she makes them fun. Homework is average but easy to forget to do and hard to catch up on if you get behind. 10/10 recommend

She is extremely nice. This class is an easy a. You don't have to read the textbook. Just do the work on bearface which takes like 5 minuets max. She knows you don't care about this class so she basically gives you the credit just for showing up. I can't say enough nice things about her. This teacher is awesome.
She is the only professor that treats you like a regular person. Great sense of humor!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She's hilarious! You'll enjoy going to this class. She knows no one wants to be there and makes class typically 45 minutes or less! She is one of my favorites. Modules are easy and its easy to get ahead. I'm done with all the assignments for the rest of the semester and its only the beginning of November. TAKE HER CLASS! you won't regret it!
Professor Balkema is the best. Her class is EASY! If you just do your modules, you will pass with flying colors. Also, you need to show up sometimes because she does take role.

She is one of the funniest professors I have had, and one of the best. The class is very easy and she makes sure that each student gets the grade that they deserve. I would highly recommend taking her for wellness.

Take her if you get the chance! She is super sweet & funny, class is super easy, just show up & complete the modules before the deadline. she gives you a review guide/cheat sheet of the midterm & final with all of the same questions as the real test that you can bring on test day. All you gotta do is fill in the answers from the book. Loved her!

She's literally the best teacher I've ever had. She will talk to you about any and everything.  We've totally just sat and had girl time during office hours. She is an easy teacher and wants you to pass. I left her class with a solid 100. If you want a gpa boost take her!!!

You need an online code, but that is pretty much it. I love this woman!! Easy class and entertaining lectures and class always ends early because she gets through them that fast. She gives more than enough time to complete assignments and this is an easy A.

She is seriously so awesome. The class is incredibly easy, all the (easy) assignments are online and you get an unnecessary amount of time to get them done. The professor is really fun during lectures and keeps them upbeat and fast so the class goes by. Would definitely recommend taking her, I know you have to get this course out of the way!

Shes super motivated and loves teaching health and I took away some valuable lessons from her course also. You'll need the online code and that pretty much it. Amazing course with an amazing professor. If your not taking her just wait until you can, cause anybody else will have you running laps around the green.

Ms. Balkema is probably the peppiest and most energetic woman I know. She is also a kindergarten teacher, which probably explains most of it. She is an amazing woman and a professor and you can tell she really cares about her students and wants all of them to pass her class. For this class, you basically complete modules on Bearface which is easy
Easiest class ever and nice person.
